other_tests.findings: Severe bilateral xerosis conjunctivae, mild punctate corneal epithelial staining, and bilateral optic nerve atrophy.
Severe vitamin A deficiency (0.1 μmol/L; normal range 0.9–2.5 μmol/L), and low vitamin D, E, B12, and iron.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After starting treatment in November 2014, vitamin A deficiency was resolved by March 2015.

other_tests.findings: Improved visual acuity (6/60 bilaterally) and resolution of xerosis conjunctivae.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Facial nerve palsies had completely resolved.
